attributes.action: stop the destruction of the rainforest tree's and animals by major busness copanies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i would like to stop the destruction of trees and animal in their natural habitat...the rainforests.
trees can be specially grown for paper and animals specially breeded for fur.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
